DOC.brief_summary: Previous animal studies have shown that extracts of Curcumin lowers blood glucose.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Curcumin on Postprandial Blood Glucose, and Insulin in Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: To study the effect of curcumin on postprandial blood glucose and plasma concentrations of insulin in fifteen healthy subjects.
DOC.criteria: Fifteen healthy subjects without symptoms or a history of gastrointestinal disease, abdominal surgery or diabetes mellitus, were included in this crossover study. Connective tissue disease or cerebrovascular or endocrine disease.
